titles.title: Elementary Mathematics and Science Equipment Act
A bill to provide assistance to States to enable such States to raise the quality of instruction in mathematics and science by providing equipment and materials necessary for hands-on instruction.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S803-805)

bill.summary: 1/27/1993--Introduced. Elementary Mathematics and Science Equipment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to allot funds to State educational agencies to award grants to local educational agencies to provide hands-on instruction equipment and materials to elementary schools to improve mathematics and science education. Authorizes appropriations. Sets forth requirements for: (1) State allotments; (2) State and local applications; (3) grant award priorities; (4) participation of private schools; (5) State and Federal responsibilities; and (6) limitation on use of grant funds only for science equipment or materials and mathematical manipulative materials necessary for hands-on instruction.
